messages.subject: LIFE is Good NW Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: I m thrilled to formally announce the first LIFE is Good NW Unschooling Conference! The conference will take place in Corvallis, OR on the weekend of April
messages.messageBody:
I'm thrilled to formally announce the first LIFE is Good NW Unschooling Conference! The conference will take place in Corvallis, OR on the weekend of April 20-22, 2007. The website is up and registration is open! I hope to see LOTS of my unschooling
tribe, old friends and new, for a weekend of talking, laughing, learning, playing and bonding. See you there!

http://www.lifeisgoodconference.com/
--
~Mary Gold
LIFE is Good Conference Coordinator
http://www.lifeisgoodconference.com/
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh
